title: Where a buildable amenity on the reserved plot for which slum rehabilitation scheme is sanctioned, is handed over, free of cost to the concerned Authority, the concerned Authority may grant a further T
clause_text: Where a buildable amenity on the reserved plot for which slum rehabilitation scheme is sanctioned, is handed over, free of cost to the concerned Authority, the concerned Authority may grant a further T.D.R. on account of construction of the said amenity, in accordance with the provisions in the UDCPR in this regard. Where, X = permissible utilization of T.D.R. / D.R. in Sq.m. on receiving plot.
section: Notwithstanding the provisions in clause mentioned above, if the developer does not desire to consume the full permissible in-situ F.S.I. on the same site, in such a case :

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
